name: receive rations
notification: The settlers have shared their rations with us!

name: receive supplies
notification: The settlers have given us supplies! (+[goldAmount] Supplies)

name: receive mana
notification: The settlers have given us precious mana!

name: gain a settler
notification: The settlers have joined us to found a city!

name: harvest corpses
notification: We have raided the settlement and harvested their corpses!

name: steal mana
notification: We have sacrificed the settlers and obtained mana!

name: steal supplies
notification: We have robbed the settlers of their supplies! (+[goldAmount] Supplies)

name: gain a slave
notification: We have enslaved the settlers to labor for us!
